rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious foyer that incorporates a reception area with natural lighting, following Vastu guidelines by aligning the entrance eastwards.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Combining kitchen and living space into one large open-plan area, featuring robust concrete walls and minimalistic design. The kitchen is designed with modern appliances and storage solutions.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated space for home office use, featuring soundproofing and ample natural light. Designed to be isolated from the living area while maintaining a connection with the courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A multifunctional living space that doubles as guest lounge, following Brutalist aesthetics. Includes built-in seating and minimalistic concrete furnishings.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A central open courtyard that acts as a focal point, encouraging natural ventilation and light. Landscaped with indigenous plants to promote harmony.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Space for laundry, storage of cleaning supplies and a small pantry, designed with durable finishes as per Brutalist design.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: A small guest toilet adjacent to the entrance hall for convenience.

openings.description: Main entry door designed with reinforced concrete and glass accents.
Large openings to the courtyard for natural light.

openings.location: Between Home Office and Central Courtyard
openings.description: Soundproof door ensuring privacy in home office area.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony. Minimalistic design with Brutalist elements and Vastu-aligned towards the north.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Dedicated bedroom for guests or children. Designed with open space and natural ventilation.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Another bedroom to accommodate additional family members, following the Brutalist design language.

rooms.name: Study/Bachelor Room
rooms.description: A relaxed, multifunctional space designed as a bachelor pad with modern amenities and a view of the courtyard.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Shared bathroom for multiple occupants, featuring contemporary fixtures and efficient water systems.

openings.description: Provides access to an outdoor balcony that overlooks the central courtyard.
Large window offering unobstructed views of the garden and courtyard.

rooms.name: Attic Loft
rooms.description: A versatile space that can be used as a creative studio, home gym, or additional storage. Designed with raw concrete finishes.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest room on the top floor to accommodate visitors, featuring minimalist decor and direct access to the loft.

openings.description: A well-lit, open staircase that follows the Brutalist design aesthetic.
Compliant with local safety codes for emergency evacuation.

vastu_notes: The main entrance is oriented east to invite positive energy.
Key rooms such as the home office and master bedroom are aligned with auspicious directions.
Open spaces like the central courtyard enhance natural ventilation and harmony.
